New Records: Virat Kohli equaled Sachin Tendulkar's record of 49 ODI hundreds
Key Match Events: Ravindra Jadeja took 5 wickets for 33 runs
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli expressed his excitement about the match being a big game and his birthday
Virat Kohli mentioned that he is enjoying playing cricket all over again
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was hyped up as a top-of-the-table clash
India have sent another stiff warning to the rest of the field after delivering a hefty 243-run defeat against South Africa
Others: India will now close out their group stage campaign against the Netherlands on Nov 12
South Africa face a surging Afghanistan squad on November 10
